id.description: The unique identifier of the dispute

order_id.description: The identifier of the order associated with the dispute

type.description: The type of dispute (e.g., chargeback, refund request)

currency.description: The currency in which the dispute amount is represented

amount.description: The disputed amount in the currency specified

reason.description: The reason provided for the dispute

network_reason_code.description: The reason code provided by the network for the dispute

status.description: The current status of the dispute

initiated_at.description: The date and time when the dispute was initiated

evidence_due_by.description: The date by which evidence needs to be submitted for the dispute

evidence_sent_on.description: The date when evidence was sent for the dispute

finalized_on.description: The date when the dispute was finalized
